TopicTitle: Changing IVA view of cockpits and pods

Articles.Content:

I basically want to replace the MK2 Cockpit interior view with the MK1, since it's much more suiting for airplanes.

Thanks.

Dm

Ok, I think I managed how to do it. There are still some problems when attaching an object in front of the cockpit (the nosecone, for example) but it still works.

Basically, you got the the .cfg file on the pod you LIKE, and put the name of what appears in the "Internals" section in the .cfg file of the part you want to CHANGE.
